subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: A third medal was denied Mariel Zagunis, the gold medalist in saber in 2004 and 2008, as she faltered in her semifinal match and the bronze medal match.
snippet: A third medal was denied Mariel Zagunis, the gold medalist in saber in 2004 and 2008, as she faltered in her semifinal match and the bronze medal match.
